Description

Utility class for static functions needed by Zend_Gdata_App

Methods

findGreatestBoundedValue, formatTimestamp,

findGreatestBoundedValue( integer|null   $maximumKey, array   $collection, ) : n/a

Description

Find the greatest key that is less than or equal to a given upper bound, and return the value associated with that key.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$maximumKey integer | null | The upper bound for keys. If null, the maxiumum valued key will be found.
$collection array | An two-dimensional array of key/value pairs to search through.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Tags

Name Description
returns mixed The value corresponding to the located key.
throws Zend_Gdata_App_Exception Thrown if $collection is empty.

formatTimestamp( int   $timestamp, ) : n/a

Description

Convert timestamp into RFC 3339 date string.

2005-04-19T15:30:00


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$timestamp int |

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Tags

Name Description
throws Zend_Gdata_App_InvalidArgumentException
